snippet.title: Marvel vs Capcom: Infinite - Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Watch Ultron, Chun-Li, Hulk, Strider Hiryu, Thor, Chris Redfield and Hawkeye battle in #MVCI plus witness the unique power of the Space Stone!
Releases September 19th, 2017

Pre-order here:
Website LInk

Pre-order the Standard Edition and receive the Warrior Thor and Evil Ryu Premium Costumes.  

Pre-order the Deluxe Edition, which includes the main game, 2017 Character Pass and Warrior Thor, Evil Ryu, Gladiator Hulk and Command Mission X Premium Costumes!  

Pre-Order the Collector's Edition in North America to get four detailed statues, LED-fueled Infinity Stone replicas and the Deluxe Edition content!

Retailer offerings may vary in select regions.

© 2017 MARVEL ©MOTO KIKAKU. ©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ©CAPCOM U.S.A., INC.
